https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6w7eP1sSsaq30VZlpqR9r2vOdy1.jpg Dan Farrell, a single father and firefighter unexpectedly falls for local florist Kate just two weeks before his stations’ annual Valentine’s Day fundraising ball. But Kate’s recent ex returns to town to win her back with a marriage proposal. Will Dan suit up to fight for love, or let the flame with Kate burn out? Be My Valentine
